metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14584 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Null pointer dereference in Tianocore EDK2 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2
qemu-efi - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.2').
